summary: The diff shows modifications to PreMeditationPage.tsx and metadata files, but contains no evidence of changes to the meditation page itself where REQ-1 (slider fix) and REQ-2 (back button restoration) must be implemented. REQ-3 appears potentially addressed via button height matching (py-2.5) mentioned in the file summary, though the actual implementation details are truncated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the time control slider in the meditation page so that dragging right increases the time value and dragging left decreases it
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to any meditation page file are present in the diff. The slider fix must be implemented in the meditation page component, but only PreMeditationPage.tsx was modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Restore the back button in the meditation page to be visible in the same position as it appears in the pre-meditation page
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to any meditation page file are present in the diff. The back button restoration must occur in the meditation page component, but only PreMeditationPage.tsx was modified.
